brainly_data.question: A Museum Curator wears a coat and uses special tools to inspect old bones, a Microbiologist wears gloves and uses a microscope to study organisms, and a Robotics Engineer wears goggles and uses a computer to conduct tests. Which workplace do these STEM employees have in common? office building factory warehouse laboratory
brainly_data.subject: English
